He doesn't know ____ he ____ be a good ____ for ____ hospital, but ____ plans ____ do ____ best ____ the ____. He doesn't know i_ he wi__ be a good f__ for th__ hospital, but h_ plans t_ do h__ best a_ the inte_____. If he doesn't get this job, there are a few other clinics in town where he will look for one.
data.fullContent: Paul has a job interview for a position at the hospital tomorrow. He is a doctor, and he just moved to a new city. He doesn't know if he will be a good fit for that hospital, but he plans to do his best at the interview. If he doesn't get this job, there are a few other clinics in town where he will look for one.
data.answer: 保罗明天要去医院面试一个职位。他是个医生，而且他刚搬到一个新的城市。他不知道自己是否适合那家医院，但他计划在面试中尽最大努力。如果他没有得到这份工作，镇上还有其他几家诊所，他可以去找。
